description: Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is treating national communication with managed print service criteria, and bulk print services.
full_summary:
APP SERIES

**Bulk Print Services**

### Solicitation Information

*   **Number** : PW-22-01014612
*   **Number of Amendment** : 2
*   **Publications Date** : November 24th, 2022 (2022-11-24)
*   **Bid Closing Date and Time** : January 6, 2023 at 3:00 pm ( Mountain Standard Time)
*   **Amendment Date** : December 12, 2022

### Procurement Category

*   **Category** : Services (SRV)
*   **Type of Procurement** : Competitive – Open bidding
*   **Trade Agreement** : Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Vendor Information

Form Credit Canada is seeking a service provider to provide bulk print services including customer correspondence. This includes managing daily distribution of customer correspondence files and timely printing and mailing services. The estimated quantity of the commodity is 1.1 million pieces of correspondence per year.

### Notice URL and Document Request

To request a copy of the solicitation document, interested vendors may contact:

*   **Name** : Dhruv Bhatt
*   **Title** : Procurement and Vendor Manager
*   **Email** : procurement@fcc-fac.ca

The candidate should note that this opportunity notice references a non-binding and completed Request for Proposal (RFP). Farm Credit Canada is not obligated to proceed. The Final proposal date was December 23, 2022 at 2:000 PM Time, CST. Please note the terms between Farm Credit Canada and one or more vendors, prior to awarding a contract. The notice has been posted in both English and French. The notice is open to a competitive bid. The bidder must meet the solication requirements.   If interested, vendors are to request the RFP document directly from Dhruv Bhatt or via email procurement@fcc-fac.ca

Federation for Canadian agriculture and food which is a Crown corporation, provides an appropriate return to our shareholder, and reinvest our profits back into the industry and communities their serve.  For more information, they visit fcc.ca. 

If additional information is needed or clarification is request- please do not hesitate to contact  the respondent at entrepreneurship_fina hemen<t">Procurement @fwç&#refcmplient/archUnit.

Refer to the contact information section below for details on who to contact with any inquiries.
